Reviews.Content: I have to say, I was very excited about this tablet, but it is just ok.  The interface with Amazon is nice.  I would love to have access to google play as well (although I understand not having this).  What drops both stars off for me was the Wi-Fi reception.  If I try to watch something with Prime or download something, even when I have 2 bars, the Kindle tells me that I should check my internet connection.  My phone (which would have 3 bars in the same location) works just fine for these activities.  I can't go to the other end of the house, nevermind upstairs or in the basement.  I have an N router with a fast network (computer, phone, even XBox all connect and work fine upstairs) and the Kindle just won't stay connected unless it is within 20 feet of the router.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY KINDLE
Reviews.Author: Sophronia L Bozeman
Reviews.Content: The kindle fire is easy to use.  I am 69 years young so my Grandchildren helped me set up some of the apps.  Now I Skype,  Swipe and I have a facebook page. Go me

Reviews.Title: Good picture poor sound
Reviews.Author: Cheryl L. Roby
Reviews.Content: I like the device.  The picture quality is excellent.  Some apps are unavailable such as Words With Friends, but I expected as much and hope they will soon be available.I gave it a low rating because of the sound quality.  I have to use earphones or speakers to hear it even when the device is only a foot or so from my face.I will be calling customer service to discuss a replacement.

Reviews.Title: Okay, has a streak down the center
Reviews.Author: Brenda L Cartwright
Reviews.Content: I have streaks in it. And the games I am still trying to figure out how to uninstall them. Picture otherwise looks really good. But when you tilt it you can see a streak right down the middle. When you touch the screen sometimes it will not switch to what you are tapping whether with or without a stylus. For the money I don't think it should have the streak in it. And should be a  little more user friendly. I am not super savy with electronics.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire 8.9" is a good buy for the money.
Reviews.Author: John Liner
Reviews.Content: Still somewhat cumbersom to navigate. Hard to bring up Home on the screen, may need to make Home more sensitive so easier to find. I do like it very much, it's a well made product, very little packaging (nice), screen is very good.It's worth becoming a Prime Member as the free videos and TV shows are good, the 2nd day shipping on all Amazon products is a great bonus. Do buy the HDMI cable to hook up your Kindle to your TV, the streeming video is seemless and well done.Do buy the 9W PowerFast Adapter, as it will recharge your Kindle in a few hours.

Reviews.Title: This is my Entertainment !
Reviews.Author: Shelly Fusco
Reviews.Content: I'll be 61 in 2 months and this is my entertainment !  I don't get to do much or get to go anywhere too often ~ I work 12hr. shifts and on my days off I like to stay at home to relax and unwind ! So my new Kindle Fire HD, is perfect for me I see things better and enjoy it much better then my first Kindle Fire !

Reviews.Title: Lost Faith.....
Reviews.Author: D. Tighe
Reviews.Content: It's the same problem over and over with this product; doesn't keep a charge and most of the time, it won't take a charge.  Had to return the 8.9 and in exchange I received yet another defective product.  This time right out of the box, the on button sticks and it's next to impossible to get it to turn on.  Immediately contacted Amazon and have yet to hear back from them. I originally started out with the basic kindle fire and not even having it for a year it had to be replaced because of lack of charge.  I've been a very loyal customer with Amazon for many years and was excited to receive my first kindle, well after going through 5 kindles less then three years.  It's time to start looking for another type of tablet from another company.  I truly did love the kindle, but I've lost all faith in the product...bummer.

Reviews.Title: My second kindle and I LOVE IT !!!!
Reviews.Author: San
Reviews.Content: I love my new 8'9 ...after having the 7 inch as my first kindle i had gotten use to the size and loved it but i must say i am very happy with my new HD 8'9. I love the graphics and the sound quality is amazing. The apps are great to do futher enhancing of an already great product. The Amazon representatives are the absolute best at resolving any concerns that i may have. I am very happy to be a Kindle Fire user. :)

Reviews.Title: Easily does the job, great tablet.
Reviews.Author: Tampa Dave
Reviews.Content: Only had the Kindle Fire HD for a few days now.  After a quick software update everything worked perfect.  WiFi speed is pretty decent, maybe just a tad less than my desktop but still very acceptable.  The screen looks great.  No, it's not an iPad but I tell you, this Kindle screen looks nice. No complaints there.  The tablet is very responsive and flips instantly to landscape or portrait view.  Games run silky smooth, no hiccups at all.  Of course there are tons of apps to select from.  Streaming movies look and sound great with no pauses what so ever.  Books look nice too and very easy on the eyes.It's really intuitive and easy to use operate.  Fired this baby up and I was up and running.  Haven't yet looked at the owner's manual.  Yes, it's that easy.Really can't think of any negatives.  For the price this tablet is a steal.  So happy I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Certified Refurbished Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Lori K.
Reviews.Content: I don't have anything especially new to add to the reviews, except to say that I bought a refurbished Kindle Fire and have not had any operating issues with it.  I am happy with my purchase

Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: STEVE HARDEE
Reviews.Content: I have had it for a week and so far it has been as good as advertised! Should have bought one sooner.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: James T. Hendricks
Reviews.Content: Love it!  I got the  kindle fire first generation 2 years ago and had no complaints!  We have purchased 4 for our children and other family members since then.  I love the larger screen and great clarity of the images on the 8.9 HD.  You can't get any better than Amazon's customer service.

Reviews.Title: The hype is true!
Reviews.Author: Sarra "Avid, curious reader; always on the lo...
Reviews.Content: This is a solid piece of "touch" technology - true to its hype and more.  I have had this kindle for 2 months now and never use my computer at home anymore.  I love the color, the ease of touch, the games, the books (including "immersion reading").  How did I live without it?  I don't know......

Reviews.Title: Excellent for Travel
Reviews.Author: Paul Haynes
Reviews.Content: You can read, watch a movie, listen to music, play games, and access the web.The screen is easy to read if you are not in direct sunlight where glare is a problem.Just read a book through a 12 hour flight and the battery was still almost 1/2 charged.Watching "Hunger Games" almost drained the battery, so 3 to 4 hours is the max you'll get if you are watching movies.Have not tried it with games.  This version does not have 3G or 4G access, but WiFi worked fine.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Morua
Reviews.Content: What can I say?! It's my third Kindle! I love, love my Kindles! Amazon, you have outdone yourselves again! I love that you can use it as wifi or on a data plan.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet at a great price
Reviews.Author: Bob Terwilliger
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet. We use it for email, facebook and searching the internet. I looked at a lot of tablets before we bought the Kindle and we are very satisfied

Reviews.Title: Love my husbands Kindle.
Reviews.Author: christine
Reviews.Content: I love our Kindle fire bought it for my husband and I use it more .Fast to the web,the things I can't do does not matter to many other wonderful features. Was on the train to Chicago for 6 hours and loved being able to have it to entertain me.The problem is now we need another one so he can have his back lol

Reviews.Title: best of the best
Reviews.Author: ray hoffer
Reviews.Content: Never hardly use lap top anymore, twice as fast, love it. Best money I ever spent , both daughters love it so much they bought their own.

Reviews.Title: An amazing electronic tool!
Reviews.Author: Rosalie A. Varnell
Reviews.Content: am thoroughly enjoying what I know how to do on my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9. Still learning more each day about the different functions, uses and protocols. What an amazing tool. Trying to learn all I can about all the different little things this tablet will do. I'm looking forward to many, many enjoyable hours with my Kindle Fire HD 8.9.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet at a great price
Reviews.Author: Bob Terwilliger
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet. We use it for email, facebook and searching the internet. I looked at a lot of tablets before we bought the Kindle and we are very satisfied

Reviews.Title: Love my husbands Kindle.
Reviews.Author: christine
Reviews.Content: I love our Kindle fire bought it for my husband and I use it more .Fast to the web,the things I can't do does not matter to many other wonderful features. Was on the train to Chicago for 6 hours and loved being able to have it to entertain me.The problem is now we need another one so he can have his back lol

Reviews.Title: best of the best
Reviews.Author: ray hoffer
Reviews.Content: Never hardly use lap top anymore, twice as fast, love it. Best money I ever spent , both daughters love it so much they bought their own.

Reviews.Title: An amazing electronic tool!
Reviews.Author: Rosalie A. Varnell
Reviews.Content: am thoroughly enjoying what I know how to do on my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9. Still learning more each day about the different functions, uses and protocols. What an amazing tool. Trying to learn all I can about all the different little things this tablet will do. I'm looking forward to many, many enjoyable hours with my Kindle Fire HD 8.9.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Telara
Reviews.Content: I really love my Kindle Fire 8.9, my first one died after about 10 months. It froze up and couldn't be restarted. Amazon replaced it with no problem. Of course, it is still under warrenty. I'm impressed with Amazon and their help desk personnel as well as the prompt shipping of my replacement unit.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Carnita Dawkins
Reviews.Content: I had the smaller kindle and love it, however this one is better. The screen, sound and not to mentionthe other features. Love It!

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: VagaBond "VagaBond"
Reviews.Content: I'm still in the learning curve on this much more elaborate Kindle.  Sometimes frustrating as with all new tech gadgets.  The colors on the screen are brilliant.  Have to admit I have not downloaded movies or music yet, mostly using it for free library books and email on the go.  Syncing the Contact List didn't work very well, however I am amazed that ALL my picture libraries were transferred in a nano-second and I wasn't even tethered to my laptop!  Not sure how that happened.I cannot tell it's refurbished it looks completely brand new.  Only dislike is that it does not stay charged as long as the old original Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Versatile
Reviews.Author: D. L. Melton
Reviews.Content: Have enjoyed the ability to do so many things on my Kindle while traveling and away from my PC.  I am looking forward to using this for a long time.

Reviews.Title: Love Books, Resisted E-reader, But Love My Kindle
Reviews.Author: LAN Guy
Reviews.Content: I love the look, feel, even the smell of books. I own many, many volumes.I read extensively for both pleasure and for professional reasons. Working in a tech field I am almost constantly refreshing my knowledge. This is what led me to purchase a Kindle.When I saw that Juniper Networks offered many FREE titles and many more publications at prices of less that $2 each I was persuaded to try  a Kindle. I chose the 8.9" for the large screen.I can now carry all of those free and inexpensive tech pubs, as well as 3rd party texts from respected publishers like O'Reilly. And I can highlight text or make notes.I like being able to enlarge the text size and illustrations. And I find the screen very easy to read.In addition to the technical books I have purchased a number of novels, collections of short stories and poetry. I appreciate the ability to check a definition of an unfamiliar word by simply touching it on the screen and calling up the pre-loaded dictionary.Now I can carry all those books in a small convenient package when I travel In the past I often had a "carry-on" sized bag with nothing but tech books when I was flying. What a great convenience.I have also loaded a good deal of music on my Kindle. Now on flights I can listen to my favorite tunes while reading for fun or for work on those long flights.I am MORE than satisfied.Will I still buy traditional books? Yes. But do I like my Kindle? YES!And I ordered a second Kindle for my college student daughter. Many of her texts are available as PDF files or in e-Book format. She can now carry all her text books for the semester on her Kindle. Very convenient.

Reviews.Title: We love it
Reviews.Author: Lally
Reviews.Content: So far, so good. The units, even though refurbished, appear to be brand new and work fine. Combined with the standing leather cases which are sold separately, we are completely satisfied with our purchases, so much that we ordered another refurbished Kindle Fire HD 8.9" 32 4G/wi-fi for our son. He'll receive it this Christmas if we can keep our paws off.

Reviews.Title: I do not like it at all.  I'd rather read a hardcover book.
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: It is not easy to navigate but the worse thing is that it comes with absolutely no directions or manual. I will never get another kindle.  You cab download a manual onto your kindle but then you can't try out things because you can't read the manual while doing anything.

Reviews.Title: Great!! Perfect-sized tablet! Learning tool & Entertainment in one :)
Reviews.Author: Heathwright
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd Kindle Fire. My 1st one arrived on 10/15/13 and immediately had issues of randomly freezing for a few seconds, then automatically restarting itself (happen 10 minutes after taking out of package, brand new). Contacted Amazon support and after attempting a reboot/hard restart and factory reset, it was determined to be an internal issue with the Kindle -- lucky Amazon replaced it that day, and I received my 2nd one on 10/17/13.  No issues with this one at all! (I think the first one was a dud.)I have an iPAD that I use on a daily basis--but I bought a Kindle Fire for my son. I bought this as a LEARNING TOOL for my child (a 3 yr old, don't bother bashing me!) & as an entertainment tablet for our on-the-go trips and occasional playtime. I love the fact that I can place a time limit on his FreeTime profile and block internet/web connections, downloads/purchases, and his access to other apps. I use apps (ABC/123/shapes) that allow him to "connect the dots" by counting, have him write the letters/numbers, and place the shape in the correct spots. I can set a password for the tablet (to prevent him from using it without my knowledge), and I can set a password that has to be entered before he can exit a game/app/movie (especially for the movie part!).The KindleFire is a perfect tablet for entertaining a child during a car ride/airplane trips or when you are at an appointment that your child wants attention "right now" while you're trying to talk to the doctor -- my son watches his kid shows & movies, and he "reads books" (the Kindle actually reads to him!).  I love the feature of the Kindle reading books to him, as I can't do that while driving.  There are a few games he plays (puzzles, counting, and such) to keep his mind active and to help him learn abstract thinking.I don't really use the Kindle much myself, aside from helping my son with his puzzles and counting/shapes.  I have browsed the internet a few times, not bad at all. I enjoy having this tablet for my son & very happy I bought it! It is a great tablet that can be used for books, apps, and internet. No complaints with this one so far!*** & Just for clarification: I do not use this as an alternative to teaching/playing with my child, nor do I use it as a distraction tool for keeping my son entertained so that I don't have to.  I've seen several comments (here and other links) of people assuming and bashing the buyer for allowing their child to use tablets--MODERATION is key, and monitoring and locking the tablet work just as good to control the amount of time/usage my son has with this. So before you start bashing people, shut up & read the comments! Don't tell me how to raise my child--you don't want me tell you either!  :)

Reviews.Title: BETTER THAN FIRST KINDLE I OWNED.
Reviews.Author: JULIA C. FLYNN
Reviews.Content: Think the Kindle Fire HD is better than my original Kindle.  Easier to read book on the HD.and love reading the newspapers which I never downloaded on old Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Dexter Kenner
Reviews.Content: Very fast tablet. Wish it was easier to print documents without having to go through so much. Great graphics... Sound also is improved .

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Tricia
Reviews.Content: Pros:  clear picture, fast, lots of appsCons:  NoneI'm enjoying my kindle very much.  Leaning something new each day that I use it.  Well worth it.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire!!!
Reviews.Author: Mrs. H
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure what I wanted when  I first started looking at Kindle Fire's but the Fire HD 8.9 is wonderful.  It is easy to use and I take it everywhere with me.  I love to read but I also want to be able to search the internet if I want and read my emails and Facebook.  You certainly won't be sorry if you buy it!!!

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: frog309
Reviews.Content: Bought this on a special sale. Looks and work just like a new kindle fire. Easy to use, nice size, lots of Apps, lots of free Apps, screen quality is VERY good.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: B. Lockrey
Reviews.Content: So far I have had no problems with my new Kindle. I liked the way my other kindle defaulted to my favorites and this defaults to the carousel and I have to tap the star to get to my favorites, but I am getting used to it. Everything has worked nicely and setup was a breeze.

Reviews.Title: Loves it
Reviews.Author: S. Blair
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift and she loves it!  She's had it for a year and it has worked well.  She's had a ton of enjoyment out of it.  The screen is very nice, and the size is great.  This was the 4th Kindle she's had.

Reviews.Title: I Love It
Reviews.Author: GREGORY A BOLDUC
Reviews.Content: I love this thing, I use it every night to put myself to sleep. I don't even need to have a light on to read. I is easy to get new stuff to read without even getting out of bed!

Reviews.Title: So clear!
Reviews.Author: rainy
Reviews.Content: It's so much easier to enjoy shows, books, even the games are so much more clearer.  The sound is so much greater then what you expect.  It's perfect for watching movies and listening to music.  Anyone would enjoy this Kindle HD. Get one and see for yourselves.  You will be happy you did.

Reviews.Title: Happy in kindleland
Reviews.Author: ZINCLADY
Reviews.Content: I am happy with my kindle - may be a "refurb" but it looks brand new and the price was excellent, so I splurged with the 32 modelfor 199.00 with a prime membership.  So many apps free so you can try it out. I shop EBAY, Amazon and I can read, watch free TV & Movies through my vios and music.  Sound is lovely, you can read or be read to.  Wow I love playing pacman. etc

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected!
Reviews.Author: Catherine A. Zukauskas
Reviews.Content: If this is suppose to be a real tablet, it needs access to all android apps. I'm just stuck with what you want me to use which for the most part is useless!!!!

Reviews.Title: Battery life
Reviews.Author: James J Sievers Jr
Reviews.Content: Very satisified except for battery life,  Apps are good.  Disappointed that I have to purchase a user's guide that should have come with the kindle.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: mark stumpo
Reviews.Content: Had no issues with this unit since day one, great battery life ans great program selection, almost as good as the Ipad.

Reviews.Title: Stellar performance
Reviews.Author: R. E. Offerhaus "Financial T. fan"
Reviews.Content: I use the kindle as an e-reader and for my newspaper(Financial Times US edition) and magazine (Economist)I used the Kindle alreadfy since its start.The problem I have with the Kindle is: I can not download music to my Kindle or cloud because I am living in Europe.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Kindle Fire's  ROCK
Reviews.Author: Pete  Scuderi
Reviews.Content: For me, this item is awesome.  Wish it had front and rear camera though, and longer battery life.  I have to charge mine 2x a day.  The newer version does address these issues (HDX).  though its $120 more.  Overall though, i'd buy the newer version as it has better screen resolution, more storage, longer battery life, and F/R camera, as well as a faster processor

Reviews.Title: Refurbished but just like new!
Reviews.Author: Carl Johns
Reviews.Content: Picked up this certified  refurbished Kindle and by looking at it you would never know that the device was refurbished. There is not a mark on it and the Kindle works perfectly! Anyone looking for an opportunity to get this Kindle at a great price will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: one great little piece of work
Reviews.Author: donald
Reviews.Content: have had it a little over a month now ... used up the coins that came with it; been shopping for more; and, have them in play ... got plenty of apps for games and books .... wife and grandkids just love the thing .... can't get it away from them .... when the grandkids come over; that's the first thing they ask for ... grandpa gets to play along, 'if' I play nice ... make sure you get the bundle of accessories, you'll need them .... as for the charger, it 'should' have come with it .... cost me another 20 bucks; and, they have them at Lowe's for 8 (hindsight) .... unit does just what its supposed to do .... pass time with enjoyment .... I'm glad we got it; and, will come in really handy on trips.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Angela Abrams
Reviews.Content: My Fire HD is the best thing I have purchased in a long time. Very user friendly and eliminates any need to carry a laptop

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9", Dolby Audio, Dual-Band Wi-Fi, 16 GB - Includes Special...
Reviews.Author: D. Esquibel
Reviews.Content: I had the regular Kindle Fire before but this one is wonderful.  Although its a little heavy, still very much worth it!

Reviews.Title: GREAT Device
Reviews.Author: Robert  S.
Reviews.Content: I just received this item a couple days ago, so far everything is going really well.  Great feel to the touch screen and quick up loading ability.  I am really impressed with the color quality of the HD with this product.  Can't wait to see a movie on this item.  I would absolutely recommend this Kindle Fire HD to anyone looking for a great priced tablet.

Reviews.Title: A good device.
Reviews.Author: homebody
Reviews.Content: Graphic quality and sound are excellent.  The Wi-Fi runs surprisingly fast and the availability of apps is outstanding.  My only critique is that the on screen keyboard is awkward.  All in all a good machine.

Reviews.Title: Myh newest Kindle
Reviews.Author: whiskers
Reviews.Content: It is impossible to believe that this Kindle is "refurbished."  I am having such a good time reading and playing on the newer larger screen.  My sister is very jealous and I am sure she will be ordering one.  Thank you.Gail Trocchio

Reviews.Title: Great Poduct
Reviews.Author: Beverly B. Harris "Ms. Beverly Baker-Harris"
Reviews.Content: I am so enjoying my Kindle refurbished HD 8.9 Kindle and it works perfectly so far . Easy to understand and use

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire is wonderful - recommend it
Reviews.Author: Luce "L.A."
Reviews.Content: It arrived in perfect condition.  It met all of my expeditions. I love "facebook" on it.  I check my emails instead of turning on my PC on weekends and can answer them easily.  Books are easy to download and read.  Refurbished is the way to go.  Its a lot better than an iPod which is SO tiny to respond to emails.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Tv, books, docs, personal projects are all getting done. This is our families second one and we love them both.

Reviews.Title: Drooling no more.
Reviews.Author: Jujubes
Reviews.Content: I've wanted an e-reader for several years, but could only recently afford to seriously entertain the idea.  I saw the special price, in an aggregator e-mail; culls offers from multiple sites.  I bit the bullet & LOVE, LOVE, LOVE my Kindle!

Reviews.Title: E9798@aol.com
Reviews.Author: Elissa Young
Reviews.Content: I love it. I haven't put it down since I got it, love the free books and all the free games.I just we could take pitcures with it I know I can take pics of my self.

Reviews.Title: well worth the money.. but.....
Reviews.Author: robert . a . kitchin
Reviews.Content: The item arrived in very good condition/ as stated. it arrived exactly on time and date and was very happy. but !..It requires an AT&T; card account to be able to link it to amazon online in order to download anything, which i didn't really want AT&T; but there ya go. I don't recall seeing anything in the write up about it needing AT&T.;

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Lafayette
Reviews.Content: This tablet is a beauty and works fantastically.  Priced to easily acquire for those of us who are wanting state of the art electronics.  Thank you Kindle.  Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My new Kindle Fire arrived at my door a month ago tomorrow. I love being able to reading books, watch movies, download and use apps, surf the 'net, and lots of other things that I thought before required using my laptop--all on this awesome product. After using my phone for such things, the large screen is truly amazing!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Sierra Bob
Reviews.Content: After researching many tablet devices I purchased the Kindle for my wife.  She loves it - clear, quick and easy to use overall - After you get it set up, which is a bit confusing in places.  Kindle was good about answering questions and getting us going though, and now it is a joy to use, especially compared to some other tablets our kids and friends have.

Reviews.Title: It's just OK
Reviews.Author: Billy Johnson
Reviews.Content: As the title states, it's just OK. I've had this for a few months now and have tried to test everything to make sure I give it a fair review. Let me start off by saying that I also own an ipad. My reasoning for stating that I have an ipad is because I can't help but compare them to each other. I with start with the dual antenna, which supposedly makes your connection better and stronger, I have found this to not be the case. I have the 50 meg service through Time Warner Cable and when I am streaming video it constantly hangs up and spins while it waits to buffer more video, never had this problem with my ipad. Picture, I will say that the shows I have watched are pretty awesome, blows my ipad out of the water, rich deep colors that let you see every detail. Sound, the sound is good but since they put the speakers facing backwards, the sound is going away from you and that takes away from the quality in my opinion. Touch screen, this is my biggest problem, I would say 85% of the time, I have to touch something at least 3 times to get it to work and that causes A LOT of frustration for me. Overall user friendliness, I would give it 2.5 stars and I think this rating has a lot to do with me owning an ipad and how user friendly that is. I would only recommend the Kindle to someone that has never owned an ipad.

Reviews.Title: Thoroughly enjoy this new gadget.
Reviews.Author: A. Hammel
Reviews.Content: Purchased the Kindle Fire HD as an upgrade from a Kindle Fire.  There have also been several upgrades since I had the Kindle Fire.  The size is nice and the picture and sound quality are great.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Sunshine "Sunshine"
Reviews.Content: This was purchased for and by my eight year old, but quite honestly I find it is superior to my iPad.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Third replacement
Reviews.Author: Barbara L. Blair
Reviews.Content: I really do LOVE the fact that I can download books in a snap, watch my favorite flick on a perfectly awesome screen with lifelike images and better than life color. I can play games with it and tuck it safely away in my carrying case. What I DO NOT like is that I have had to have it replaced 3 times. THREE times. I had problems with it starting on month 5. It went hot for a while, I learned to use the reset button from the kind folks at the help center and all was well for about 3 more weeks. Then? Then it went black screen and would not move on from there. After doing everything a good owner should do. I was told it was probably a gonner, and was sent a replacement. A great side note is this. I am a 60 year old woman that uses her Kindle only when I go to bed for reading, a few games perhaps, and maybe once a month part of a movie. It has a protective case and even if it DID fall from bed, which it has never done, I also have the suggested protective case. I happily opened my replacement kindle. I was thrilled. For about 5 days. Then the sound stopped. Now I don't ALWAYS need the sound, but occasionally I like to have the Bible read to me! This was no longer an option. So I again called the help center, I jumped through the hoops, and there you have it. Replacement came in the mail...nice and prompt as before. Loving the fact that I once again had a "working" Kindle, I turned it on, listened to the sound, and was content. That is until 3 days later........I was going to use my headphones to listen to my movie. CRACKEL.... then nothing. I thought it must of course be my headphones. SO, I quickly grabbed my husbands set.  the help desk. However this time....lets see how I should put this.... Nothing. You have GOT to be kidding me!!!! I did the turn off, reset, which I KNEW would do nothing...and it didn't. BACK on the phone with the help desk. Let me see. How can I be nice? I asked the attendant if these were replacements that I was getting. She assured me that the HAD left the center in PERFECT order. I suggested that since this was going to be my FOURTH Kindle in 8 months, perhaps the refurbish center wasn't doing a quality control check. She said that EVERY kindle that left there was touched by HUMAN hands and it WAS prefect when it was sent. I wondered at this point if she was calling me a deceptive client. Having had issues twice with the sound, and once with it just signing off forever.....giving me the reluctant benefit of the doubt, she was not what you would call gracious about it, but she said she would have a replacement sent out. How can a 60 year old woman who rarely leaves the house for ANY reason, lives in the forest, has no youngsters ever touch this thing, and only uses it on a highly soft mattress, have ever damaged this wondrous thing. I did receive my replacement. I did again open the box with some sort of glee. I again put the damaged kindle in its little coffin for return. I again walked solemnly to my bed chamber. And with some sort of obtained enthusiasm looked forward to my reading and small game time before slumber. And what happened just LAST evening? The sound once again left me. No sound....and with some sort of "autopilot", I jumped through the hoops, fidgeted with the volume control, and tried another set of headphones. What now you might ask? I can honestly say......I have NO IDEA. I am not really looking forward to the banter on the help line, nor am I looking forward to being shamed of eluded to as some sort of perky youth that has Frisbee play with this object. I would ask for a NEW kindle, but I fear that is not an option. I do not read lips for the Netflix, I kind of like the Bible being read to me.....(Old Testament kind of blurs and I lose focus)....I like hearing the sound of the fake slots on Slotmania.  So......maybe I will have another cup of coffee and mull over my options.....................

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Let me qualify this review by stating that I have a Nexus 10 and this was bought for my wife.  For the price, it has most of the bells and whistles.  Great display and connectivity to kindle material.  Not as easy to use as I would like, the modified Android OS is quirky, sometimes it's hard to find the main menu from within other functions.  We own a pretty large library of books and the biggest issue is that in transferring via usb, most of them wind up in the docs folder.  I have no idea why the device moves some to docs and some to books and I can't find a workaround.  It's a problem in that indexing in the docs folder is very limited and makes it hard to find the book you want.  My really big complaint, however, is the time it takes to charge the device.  With the basic charger you will need to leave it plugged in overnight to get a full charge. With the "optional" higher watt charger, it still takes 6+ hours to charge.  This would be ok if battery life were better, but it isn't great.  All in all, worth the price and 1/2 of what my Nexus cost.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: sunshine lady
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire HD.  I am still learning.  I am a 72 year old grandmother and I like keeping up with my grandkids.  It is fun. I love to send e mails, play a lot of games.  I haven't read a story as of yet, but I will soon.  It is so handy to stick in my purse and take along with me.  Try one soon.  You will be glad you did.  Sunshine lady.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Jacqui Bennett
Reviews.Content: My brother and I purchased this for our mother so she could down load books...it works great and she loves it. Our mother is 84 years young by the way!

Reviews.Title: Very Surprized
Reviews.Author: Erin Berger
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle today, four hours later the sound goes out.  Will be returning this weekend once all the accessories I ordered to go with it come in so can return everything at once.  So very disappointed!

Reviews.Title: My wishlist for a better product
Reviews.Author: M. V. Vooren "velvetpaws999"
Reviews.Content: OK, so I ordered not one, but two of these tablets: one for myself, one for my niece. The screen quality is great, comparable to the i-pad. Play-back sound is good enough for every-day expectations. Don't expect it to have the power of a boom box, or a full stereo equipment!I must say it is probably my own fault that I find this product lacking in a few ways: I should have read the specs more carefully.  Why did I not read them? I guess it is so much common place already to have these features even in mini-size smart devices that it never occurred to me that they are not on the Kindle!1) It sucks that this tablet cannot take videos. Photos, yes - but hardly: as long as you take them with the front camera, which admittedly is not easy, if the taker does not want to be in the picture.How much more can it cost to integrate a second camera lens, to allow photo taking? I mean, come on, Amazon, the little i-phone and other comparable tablets have it, so why not the Kindle tablet?2) This leads to point two: No video recording!!! Same as above... it should just have it! I wonder what Amazon is thinking... do they believe people will go and buy an i-pad or a Nexus on top of the Kindle Fire, in order to get these features?These two points are my biggest regrets for the Kindle Fire 8.5, and I find it truly regrettable and disappointing!Other things I wish it had: a software for note-taking and email dictation. Obviously, that goes with the above two points: if they can integrate a camera, they can integrate a software like I have on the iPhone, for instance, to use spoken dictation with the microphone.In conclusion of this, I'd call it a rather passive tablet. You can watch videos, you can see photos you took with another camera, you can play back music recorded by another device... You cannot do any of it WITH this tablet.You can surf the web and look at websites, and you can type (albeit painstakingly) your emails with it, no dictation.I guess the two most useful features I will use are the consolidated email feature, where you can see the email of any number of different accounts (yahoo, aol, gmail, you name it...) in one glance.And of course, reading books. That may be its best feature, since one has access to what... millions of them by now, and lots of them for free. Their number is increasing each day!As for the movie watching, it is OK, but I'd rather still use my laptop for this, since it can load and stream them faster than the Kindle, not to mention that I prefer a larger screen for that.I'd willingly give it 5 stars, if they will integrate the features mentioned above.Sometimes, I'm wondering what those tech designers are thinking when they put together a package.... or maybe they are not thinking much? Without those features, a user has to still have another tablet/smart phone, to do what the Kindle is lacking. Nobody wants to spend twice the money and schlepp two tablets around! What for???~!!!  So, Kindle designers: Please, put those features on the Kindle Fire and keep yourself in the market.

Reviews.Title: Kindle for life
Reviews.Author: kodocat
Reviews.Content: I started with a keyboard kindle and thought this was it! My husband got the kindle fire but besides games it didn't interest me.  When he got me the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" 4G LTE I thought this was overkill.  I almost sent it back too large but decided to give it a chance.  You know some people don't like change.  Well I got a great cover stant and  started with a game, then streamed a show, then went to the apps and I've taken off.  I can do most anything I want on this thing.  I did have to buy wireless air time but I rarely need it as I'm within wireless connections most times.  I also got a supercharger that cut my time for charging a plus it worked on my phone too. I love that all my books from my keyboard kindle are available.  Who says you can't use two kindles.  When I need something compact I still use my old keyboard or use my husbands smaller fire. I'm not embarrassed to admit we are a kindle family.  I've gifted my daughter one, Next will be the grandkids.

Reviews.Title: Serviceable.
Reviews.Author: CanIGoNow
Reviews.Content: The one real disappointment about this device is the battery/charging situation. It's kind of a complete joke. The battery drains within an hour or two, even when it's plugged in as you're using it. I've had several instances of plugging it in to charge via USB while I'm at work (read: not using it) only to find that it has not only not charged at all, but drained to the point of shutting off. I've also plugged it in to charge overnight in a wall outlet and woke up to find that, again, it hasn't charged but has drained and shut off. I plugged it in to a different outlet, checked it after 30 minutes or so to make sure something was happening, and then left it plugged in for another ten hours. When I checked it before bed, it was charged to 86%. That is nothing short of ridiculous, I'm sorry.I am aware of a special "quick charge" device that you can purchase separately to charge in under 5 hours (Wow, you're kidding! Strap in and put your helmets on kids, this is ludicrous speed! /sarcasm #Spaceballs), but I think it's absurd that you have to buy a "special charger" to make the thing function normally.The picture is fine, the sound is fine, the app availability is marginal, the interface is acceptable. It's hard to care about much else when you can't even use it for any reasonable length of time.In this case you get what you pay for. It was cheap, and it functions accordingly. I wouldn't buy this again, nor recommend it to others. If I need a new tablet in the next year or two (which seems likely), I'll look elsewhere for a device with a less flaccid battery.

Reviews.Title: Keeps getting better
Reviews.Author: Derrek
Reviews.Content: My Kindle history started with the original, then when the fire came out I had to have one.  Loved the Fire.  I contemplated for a very long time about the HD though.  I was back and forth between an Ipad, tablet, or a Fire HD.  I was so close to buying an Ipad but decided to stay loyal to Amazon.  I was not disappointed.  I still haven't really explored all the features.  I just found out I can connect a Bluetooth keyboard to make typing easier, which is awesome.  Everything is sharper than the old Fire, which was already pretty awesome.  The larger size makes everything better too.  If you are trying to make the same decision, I would look at it this way: If you want a tablet that can do everything, you will need to pay well over a thousand dollars.  With the Ipad and Android tablets you still pretty much need a computer.  With that in mind, if you look at what you are getting for the price, Kindle Fire HD is definitely the way to go.

Reviews.Title: So much better than my old kindle
Reviews.Author: Joseph Jaworski
Reviews.Content: So much fun, I pick it up and the hours just fly by.  Love the big bright screen and how it senses motion. No complaints,

Reviews.Title: I enjoy it
Reviews.Author: lori
Reviews.Content: I like the size.  The weight is a bit less than my original Kindle Fire.  Easy to use.  I haven't had it long enough to encounter any real issues.

Reviews.Title: Very entertaing!
Reviews.Author: Marc
Reviews.Content: Great product! Packed with entertainment. Fire is the bomb! Wish I could access Fire on my smartphone like I can my books.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Hu Neng Zai
Reviews.Content: it's my first pad, i just want to be more different with my friends, so i chose it. It's very good,  i like it very much!

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: I really like the kindle for reading and watching movies which is what I do to relax. It was easy to get started and tech support is easy to access with friendly assistance of the staff.  My only issue has been that it does not last 10 to 11 hours when I watch movies.  I have called tech support numerous time but cannot seem to get the time up over about 5 hours.  I am thinking I must be doing something wrong.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Texas Jim
Reviews.Content: As expected it exceeded  my two other Kindles in every manner but one, and that was battery life. I'll adjust to that and it will not be a problem. Its like carrying around a small flat screen TV. Great sound, picture and easy to use.It is used like a Lap Top too. Would recommend this to people that have children in Grade School.

Reviews.Title: a great deal
Reviews.Author: bcso59
Reviews.Content: I use my kindle hd 8.9" every day.  It's easy to navigate  and doesn't take long to get accustomed to.  I hardly get on my laptop or use my iPad anymore.  (Just purchased the 7" kindle fire hd to keep in my purse.)  Would definitely recommend the kindle fire hd.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: patricia mashek-aras
Reviews.Content: Love it, its very touchy, have to get used to the touch screen. battery doesn't seem to last as long as I thought. Picture is sooooo crisp and clear.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Cindy Tommervik
Reviews.Content: I had the original kindle and it served my purposes just fine. I bought my Granddaughter the 7" Kindle Fire and when I saw what that one could do I decided to jump to the 8.9" for myself. Wonderful performance and versatility. Our other Granddaughter stayed with us for a week and fell in love with the new 8.9". She will have a Kindle Fire under the tree at Christmastime.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful!
Reviews.Author: Sandra Starich
Reviews.Content: This was purchased by my daughter and she loves it...especially the Internet capabilities.  A great price for a great product!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9" Dolby Audio, Dual-Band Wi-Fi, 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Amazon lvr
Reviews.Content: I love almost everything about this Kindle Fire HD! The one thing I am so very disappointed in is when you are typing in something. It CONSTANTLY skips spaces and never types what you want. The one thing that works is when you use the Swype. I was going to get an iPad and went with the Kindle Fire HD instead (because I had the original Kindle 2nd Generation and LOVED IT!!!)I wish the typing aspect was as pleasurable as the rest of the Kindle!

Reviews.Title: Their were no instruction, written, to get started with. I did not find it easy to work my way through all the apps.
Reviews.Author: Don Dunlop
Reviews.Content: Their were no written instructions to help get started. I did not find it easy to work my way through the apps. I wanted to use, I am a computer novice. I think I should have started with just a reader and then taken the next step to the fire.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9
Reviews.Author: allison robertson
Reviews.Content: FIRE  HD 8.9 don't like at&t; everything else is great. does what it says it wil.l have had no problems

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: You Know
Reviews.Content: I LOVE IT does everything you need perfect size, scene and device. The apps are great with slot of free ones to pick from.

Reviews.Title: Bigger is better
Reviews.Author: DmC
Reviews.Content: I already had a 7 inch Kindle Fire and I must say that the extra size makes a huge difference in usability. I just keep this one at home and it's basically eliminated my need for a separate computer.

Reviews.Title: What Can I Say,  I Love My Kindle!
Reviews.Author: L. J. "Amazonian99"
Reviews.Content: Amazon, you nailed it with this tablet.  The only thing I would change is the camera  should also face in the back, to take pictures of other people.The one thing I don't understand is why my other Kindle keyboard paper white,  always connects through WiFi, and never discloses the origin.  The Kindle FHD discloses the origin, usually my own network, it doesn't piggyback WiFias easily as the Paper white does.  Does anyone know why?Thanks in advance

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle!!
Reviews.Author: lisallisad
Reviews.Content: I just upgraded to the Kindle Fire HD and absolutely love it!!!  I never use my laptop anymore!!Best tablet I have ever owned!!

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Eileen M. Vucelich
Reviews.Content: My friends have Kindles and they kept urging me to buy one.  Well, I am so glad I did.  I love it.  I look forward to surfing the web, checking my emails, and learning more about the Kindle.I bought a nice cover for it, that opens up and the Kindle stands up in it.  Love to sit on the sofa with the Kindle on my lap and watch Numb3rs, surf the web for gardening info, etc. and check my email.  I keep learning more about how too use my Kindle and that makes it more fun and interesting.The screen is a good size and everything I have to say is good about the Kindle; I know you'll love it, too.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Kathleen D. Moody "catsabuggin"
Reviews.Content: More than I thought it would be.  It is perfect and so is price. Glad I decided to purchase it.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: LAVISTASUE "SUE"
Reviews.Content: Love it just wish I could trade it for the one with 4G but this one does fill all my needs and everyone is jealous.  Still lots to learn but I did find the Kindle HD for Dummies so that has helped alot.  Us Babyboomers are use to pamphlets to tell us how to use things but we are coming around to this digital age. ha

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 8.9
Reviews.Author: Paul Thomas
Reviews.Content: Great , everything work just the way like it to , I just have one criticism and that is the carousel. I think there should be an option to use your own wallpaper and have an option to leave the carousel empty , using the favourites instead. All I really want on the main screen is bigger time and date app and maybe a battery level app too . The search bar and menu options are great and overall I love my new Kindle.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Bryan Matias
Reviews.Content: must buy. great for apps. .like an iPad but less expensive ... great screen resolution. . fast.. kids friendly... great for travel pc

Reviews.Title: been wanting one since I saw someone with one
Reviews.Author: [STRM]
Reviews.Content: so grabbed one while I had the chance! love love love it! I loved my kindle fire, but got this for the larger screen... now I never use my fire.... but I do have it as back up

Reviews.Title: This item is a great value compared to others on the market..
Reviews.Author: Lyle J. Mortensen
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is great since I can read the items purchased for my 1st Kindle reader.  The interaction with the Spanish-English dictionary is good.  The HD resolution is so good and I am able to read all attachments that I currently cannot see on my older smart phone.  I am very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Was just looking for a reader
Reviews.Author: ReallyJennifer
Reviews.Content: I was torn on which reader to purchase, as I had a kindle before and loved it for reading - I have an iPad, iphone and a laptop, so the fire was not on my list of things to buy - when my older kindle died, I spent way too much time comparing all of the readers, but none of them met all of my desires - mainly size, backlight and the ability to be read to... The fire was the only one that had all of that - even though I didn't need all of the other media it offers. Well, I have been pleasantly surprised with my purchase!  I love it as a reader and I LOVE having amazon prime on it - I use it to watch programs as well.  I'm not totally thrilled with the social media apps, but it could be that I am just used to my Mac products.Anyway - if you are just looking for a reader that is middle price point, and offers everything the others have combined, then this kindle is for you.

Reviews.Title: I don't use my laptop anymore
Reviews.Author: Monique
Reviews.Content: I rate this Kindle 8.9" a 5 star because it is awesome. It does everything they need. I just should have got the one that was louder

Reviews.Title: A perfect gift for our grandson
Reviews.Author: Silver Eagle
Reviews.Content: Grandson, age 11, thinks it is wonderful.  So do I when I can steal it away from him for a few minutes.

Reviews.Title: Does Everything I Want
Reviews.Author: Corky-G "Corky-G"
Reviews.Content: A great display and very intuitive structure.  I have used it for over 4 weeks now and am still finding new things.  I do my email, check my accounts, and read many of my subscribed magazines.  Now I have opened up Sirius XM radio, and it is almost as good as what is in my car.  The Amazon Prime option is well worth it.  I got the Paper White for my wife, and between the two Kindles, we have it all.

Reviews.Title: Acknowledgement
Reviews.Author: Glenda Ross
Reviews.Content: We like all the features especially the larger screen !Our smaller Kindle which we had just a little over a year would no longer accept the charging plug-in and we had to buy a new unit.We tried to get you to resolve this issue but we go no cooperation from you and needless to say that did not make us very happy.We felt that you were aware that this was a known Mfg. problem and you should stand behind your product - so that is that !!!Lesson learned I guess !!!

Reviews.Title: In Love!
Reviews.Author: MC
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 Kindle fires last month - one for the girls & one for the boys. We absolutely LOVE them!! Great for reading, playing games, recipe searches & DIY projects. Definitely worth every penny we spent!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: NanaNay "NanaNay"
Reviews.Content: I've been a hold out for years to getting an e-reader but I love reading books on it.With the addition of Amazon Prime I can also watch many different show and movies. Love it.The HD picture is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9 4G LTE Wireless.
Reviews.Author: Judi Bizzaro
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love it! I had another Kindle that wasn't color and it was smaller. I like that one too, but the Kindle Fire Rocks. If you like to read as much as I do, I highly recommend this Kindle. You won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HD!!
Reviews.Author: mommy "mom"
Reviews.Content: Perfect and lightweight. Fits in my purse. Can check FB or play a game anywhere, anytime. Great for long trips. Color and picture bright and brilliant. How did I ever live without one?

Reviews.Title: love my kindle
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle. I love having access to books movies and tv shows.  I love amazon prime but just wish movies and shows were cheaper after you pay your yearly fee.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet...
Reviews.Author: R. McIntyre "rickitikitavi"
Reviews.Content: We purchased our Kindle Fire specifically so our grandson would have "entertainment" while traveling with us and it has not disappointed.  The number of free apps keeps expanding daily and he is always finding new "games" to try.The only drawback that we have found is that you apparently cannot use the Kindle Fire while it is charging.  We have not been able to get it to "unlock", or if unlocked when initially plugged in, cannot get it to play any apps while it is charging.  The Kindle has a 2-3 hour battery life when playing graphic intensive games and on long trips needs to be recharged.  We have yet to find a way to use it while it is charging.  The Apple iPad, which my son and daughter own, does not have this problem.  It can be played while it is charging.  However, due to the vast difference in price between the iPad and the Kindle, unless you really, really need to use the tablet while it is charging, I am not sure the iPad is worth the extra bucks.All-in-all we are extremely pleased with our Kindle Fire purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great upgrade.
Reviews.Author: Lora Romeo
Reviews.Content: Awesome! LOVE the bigger screen and ability to actually respond on my juno email!  This wad a great deal as my original Fire was not working and I wad offered an upgrade at $100.00 off and there was a Father's Day deal of $20.00 off!  I was very Happy, although the original Fire should have lasted longer! It was my second replacement of the original.

Reviews.Title: Special offers are no bother.
Reviews.Author: D. Mack "Wooden Wizard"
Reviews.Content: I have the original fire also.  I very much like the bigger screen and the better resolution.  I use this all the time to play Netflix and Amazon movies on the TV.  Keeps up with no issues.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HD 8.9!
Reviews.Author: Evenflo09
Reviews.Content: I received this as a gift 2 months ago and am just now getting to the review. I wanted to give myself time for any problems to show themselves. I can honestly say I haven't found any. I've got to say that at first I was not happy to know it came with ads, but they are really tailored to you personally and I've found several with great deals! I got a $3 coupon off on MP3's and so have purchased a couple of single songs to start off my music collection and with the new Dolby stereo they sound wonderful! I also own an older KF and the sound is a HUGE improvement in HD units. You can actually listen to books, movies, games, without any headphones/earbuds if you want. I also love the bigger screen and the quality and crispness is fantastic! I had spent time reading reviews on different devices before I threw my hint out for the KFHD and alot of them said that the quality was excellent and I must say it is!!! The HD also has Bluetooth as well for those who want to listen in private and the little unit I purchased here on Amazon was easy to pair with KFHD. I am also looking into a Bluetooth keyboard to add for ease of use as well. I absolutely love the immersion reading experience! It does actually immerse you into the story more so that just reading and is so nice whenever you need to be up moving around to listen to the story and have it pick up sound wise where you left off read wise, and vice versa. I've seen people complaining about the apps or should I say, the lack thereof, but there is a way to side load many apps. I've enjoyed the free month of prime that came with the KFHD and at $79 a year doesn't seem like a bad deal at all. There were so many movies, shows, games, and books that were free for prime members to use and enjoy that I was never bored. The KFHD may not be as high tech as other android devices on the market, but for many people this is a plus! I can see where older people and younger children would find this an easy unit to use. I enjoy mine and use it everyday. I actually don't know what I would do without it now! As I said before, the KFHD may not as high tech as some android devices, but if you are looking for a cost effective little pad with basic web, excellent sound and screen, access to Amazon with all it's books, games, and apps, wrapped up in a simple, easy to use interface, then the KFHD 8.9 is for you.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Paul Eznack
Reviews.Content: I really liked my wife's 7" Kindle Fire HD, but for me, I wanted a larger screen, so I went with the 8.9". It's awesome and I love it. I definitely recommend the 8.9" Kindle Fire HD to anyone wanting a large screen for watching videos and I have already recommended it to several of my coworkers.

Reviews.Title: great except limited google apps
Reviews.Author: Leo Ohms
Reviews.Content: I noticed that many of the google apps that are available on phones are not available for the Kindle  fire 8.9 .

Reviews.Title: audio low
Reviews.Author: Margaret
Reviews.Content: would have loved it if audio volume would be a little louder. our Kinldle fire hd 7" dose have louder volume your tech was suprised.vidio and text are  good, would have liked a SD card. its still very good

Reviews.Title: love
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Love this kindle!the size is just right and it is an awesome product!This is theperfect size for travelling!

Reviews.Title: Product is nice and is light and easy to carry which is the reason for purchase
Reviews.Author: Albert C. Andrews
Reviews.Content: Was extremely unhappy with lack of written instruction manual.  Just plain stupid not to have one and found it unbelievable.If you have never used a kindle before it is different enough from a laptop that a manual is needed.  Don't tell me there isone loaded in memory!!!!!!!!!!!!  How do you get to read it if you can not start up kindle and know it is there and how toaccess it.  Or how do you follow a multi step instruction if you can not print it out when you get to it.  It is much simpler tolearn something if ;you can read step 1, do it, then read step 2 and do it etc, etc........ If you have trouble with a step andtry to check what you were suppose to do: you can not do it without changing screens.  A simple black and whitemanual on inexpensive white offset paper produced in large quantities would add only a minute cost.  I almost returnedthe kindle because of this issue.  Its a stupid cost avoidance that I am sure causes many people great aggravation.You have a good product why cause new users major problems.  I know I have told at least 15 to 20 people about thisand 100%  could not believe it did not have a users manual.  I originally thought it was a packaging mistake..I was then told it was not a mistake but that there was one in the memory.  I then asked how to access it and print it out.Your telephone person spent 15 to 20 minutes teaching me to access it.  He originally told me it could be printed out froma PDF but could not locate it.  Great product, lousy introduction to it.

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: VikkiG
Reviews.Content: The kindle fire didnt arrive with a user guide however the screen is pretty self explanatory. The graphics are wonderful and the sound is amazing. definitely worth the money

Reviews.Title: Kindle HD!
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: Like the size of this kindle, big enough to watch movies on.  Faster than the first version, better graphics, more memory.  The reason only 4 stars is the buttons.  The buttons are incredibly hard to find, especially in the dark.  Even after 6 months (about) of ownership I still fumble around looking for where the buttons are.This is a problem with all of the HDs
